title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says "the future is neural rendering" at CES 2026, teasing DLSS advancements — RTX 5090 could represent the pinnacle of traditional raster
summary: During a Q&A at CES 2025, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says that the future of graphics is neural rendering, and that the company is "working on things in the lab that are just utterly shocking and incredible."

summary: In a move that reflects the downsizing of late-night TV, ABC’s “Jimmy Kimmel Live” will be decreasing its music performances in the coming weeks, a source confirms to Variety. title: Phison's new SSD controller sips a mere 2.3W and runs at 14.7 GB/s, addressing PCIe 5.0's power concerns — more affordable and power-saving PCIe 5.0 drives are coming for laptops and gaming handhelds
summary: Phison launches the new E37T PCIe 5.0 SSD controller at CES 2026, while also providing an update on the E38 controller with upcoming drives spanning up to 8TB.

title: Community tests confirm DLSS 4.5 yields 20%+ performance loss on older RTX 30 and 20 series GPUs compared to DLSS 4.0 — Nvidia warnings ring true following rollout
summary: DLSS 4.5 testing by enthusiasts has revealed a 20% or greater performance reduction compared to DLSS 4.0 on RTX 20- and 30-series GPUs.

title: Hands-on with Asus’s ROG Falchion Ace 75 HE: Premium gaming, with an emphasis on physical adjustments and web-based configuration
summary: Asus’s ROG Falchion Acer 75 HE checks all the boxes for a premium gaming keyboard in 2026, including magnetic switches, 8K polling, Rapid Trigger, a web-based utility, and, of course, RGB. Its stand-out feature is a tactile rocker wheel that lets you fine-tune the switches on the fly.

title: Raspberry Pi and mini PC home lab prices hit parity as DRAM costs skyrocket — price hikes force hobbyists to weigh up performance versus power consumption
summary: The price of a Raspberry Pi now has parity with Intel N100 mini PCs at just over $200, with flash memory price spikes continuing to push prices up across the board.

summary: أعلن المنتخب النيجيري، مغادرة أكور آدامز لاعب الفريق، لمعسكر النسور في المغرب، لأسباب عائلية.

title: لاعب نيجيريا: نثق بالفوز بلقب أمم أفريقيا.. ومنتخب مصر سيتواجد في نصف النهائي
summary: أكد أكور آدامز نجم منتخب نيجيريا، أن منتخب بلاده تخطى أحزان عدم الوصول إلى كأس العالم 2026، مشيراً إلى أن فريقه سيفوز بلقب كأس الأمم الأفريقية 2025.

title: Thermaltake goes retro at CES 2026, shows off liquid cooler with CRT-themed display and 80s-style PC cases
summary: The nostalgia hits hard with Thermaltake's new products

title: Asus debuts ROG NeoCore Wi-Fi 8 router concept at CES — promising better range and lower latency for gamers and smart homes
summary: The Wi-Fi 8 concept router emphasizes stable performance, smarter bandwidth use, and improved mesh networking all wrapped up in a D20 looking 'dice'.

title: Nvidia introduces DLSS 4.5 and Multi Frame Generation 6X at CES 2026 — updated models can generate higher-quality upscaled frames and more of them, dynamically
summary: Nvidia might not be introducing new gaming GPUs at CES 2026, but version 4.5 of its DLSS upscaler and an upcoming MFG 6x mode promises better image quality and smoother performance.

title: Alienware brings OLED to its gaming laptops for the first time in years — anti-glare OLED display boasts 240Hz refresh rate and 0.2ms response time
summary: Alienware is bringing its 16-inch laptops up to speed with other high-end offerings, introducing a 240Hz OLED panel for the first time ever across its Area-51 and Aurora designs.

title: Keychron launches wireless Q Ultra keyboard series with up to 660 hours of battery life with 8K polling — plus a keyboard made of marble
summary: Keychron launches new Q Ultra keyboard series with up to 660 hours of battery life with an 8K wireless polling rate, thanks to open source ZMK firmware. Also announces high-end luxury keyboards made of rock.

title: Asus ROG G1000 gaming PC is covered in holograms — this RTX 5090, 9950X3D rig is 'built to be seen'
summary: There are also new gaming laptops.

title: Acer announces new Predator-series wireless gaming headset and mouse  — Galea 570 wireless headset and 8K Predator Cestus 530 gaming mouse due in first quarter
summary: Acer announced the Predator Galea 570 wireless gaming headset and the Predator Cestus 530 wireless gaming mouse alongside its new gaming laptops at CES 2026.

title: Acer brings trio of Predator and Nitro gaming monitors to CES — 1,000 Hz dual-mode, 5K 165 Hz, and 360Hz WQHD QD-OLED
summary: Acer has three new gaming monitors for CES 2026, including a 27-incher that can do 1,000 Hz at 720p.

title: Acer updates Predator, Nitro gaming laptops at CES 2026 – Panther Lake finds its way across the lineup
summary: Acer's new Predator and Nitro gaming laptops are getting bumps up to Intel's 3rd Gen Core Ultra Series processors, but we don't know how much they'll cost.

title: HP puts HyperX name on Omen gaming laptops — new systems get Intel and AMD's latest processors
summary: HP has put HyperX front and center as its gaming system brand, combining it with Omen as it updates systems to Panther Lake and Gorgon Point.

title: MSI’s Prestige ultra-thin laptops and convertibles embrace Panther Lake – up to Core Ultra X9 with standard OLED panels
summary: MSI includes Intel Panther Lake processors across the board (up to a Core Ultra X9) with its new Prestige family.

title: Dell brings back XPS laptops — ditches the capacitive touch bar, adds 1Hz display option, and upgrades 14 and 16-inch models
summary: Dell is bringing back the XPS laptop brand, and has redesigned the system to remove the controversial capacitive function row. This year's XPS 14 and 16 are getting Intel's Panther Lake processors, and a new 13-incher is coming later this year.

title: واصل مشواره بفضل الهدوء والخبرة.. ماذا قال كاف عن فوز منتخب مصر على بنين؟
summary: حقق منتخب مصر فوزاً ثميناً على نظيره بنين بثلاثة أهداف مقابل هدف، في دور الـ16 من كأس أمم أفريقيا 2025.

title: بعد ثنائية مروان وياسر.. زيادة هدافي الجيل الحالي لمنتخب مصر في أمم أفريقيا
summary: ازداد عدد مسجلي الأهداف لمنتخب مصر في كأس الأمم الأفريقية بعدما سجل الثنائي مروان عطية وياسر إبراهيم ثنائية ضد منتخب بنين.

title: فابيو كانافارو: الجميع يعرف النادي الأهلي.. وأجواء التتش دائمًا مختلفة
summary: أبدى فابيو كانافارو، أسطورة كرة القدم الإيطالية، احترامه للنادي الأهلي مؤكدًا أن الجميع يعرف الشياطين الحمر من كل أنحاء العالم.
